TopicTitle: What music do you listen to?

Articles.Content: I wanna know what everyone listens to when they play ksp considering I've been listening to the stock music and it gets repetetive.

I usually have space related videos on YouTube, some Movie or TV show going on one of my other monitors.  Otherwise the select few bands I listen to(right now, anyway) are in the spoiler.  I leave KSP muted all the time.

Spoiler

B*Witched
Chvrches
Paramore
September
Tegan And Sara
Weird Al Yankovic
Yeah Yeah Yeahs
Take a look around The Lounge subforum. There are several music threads there.
